benchmark_details.name: A VQA-Hard and Music-A VQA-Hard
benchmark_details.overview: We curate and release A VQA-Hard and Music-A VQA-Hard by filtering out items solvable from a single frame to enable faithful evaluation of audio-visual reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable faithful evaluation of how audio contributes to video understanding in Video-LLMs.

data.source: Constructed by filtering existing datasets to remove items solvable from a single frame.

methods: Comparison of model variants with and without audio
methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the percentage of correct answers for the question-answering tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in utilizing audio and visual information in Video-LLMs.
methodology.validation: Performance validated across multiple benchmarks and model configurations.
